sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: OAA is a consultant to HealthLytix and has received speaker’s honorarium from Lundbeck and Synovion. SD has received speaker’s honorarium from Lundbeck. The other authors declare no conflict of interest.

sec.title: Code availability
sec.p: All code and software needed to generate the results is available as part of public resources: LD score regression (https://github.com/bulik/ldsc), FUMA (https://fuma.ctglab.nl/), MiXeR (https://github.com/precimed/mixer), BM location (simulation, training, and model) [made public upon acceptance].
